timeline.author: bdelbosc

timeline.bodyText:
This means a KV store roundtrip for each bucket to get the action name which is a potential perf problem.
A possible solution is to have a very basic cache on getCommand (just keep the last entry),
or to provide a different method signature appendExternalBucket(String action, BulkBucket bucket), because the scroller should have the knowledge of the action.
timeline.author: bdelbosc

replies.bodyText: I chose to use a PassiveExpiringMap with a TTL of 1 minute because, in the context of the 10B benchmark, we may have two commands at the same time, one for each repository.
